title: Article 3 - Child-care Agencies
content:
Article 3 - Child-care Agencies

State Regulations

Part 441 - General (§ 441.1 to 441.26)

Part 442 - Institutions (§ 442.1 to 442.26)

Part 443 - Certification, Approval and Supervision of Foster Family Boarding Homes (§ 443.1 to 443.12)

Part 444 - Host Family Homes (Subpart A to D)

Part 445 - School Notifications (§ 445.1 to 445.2)

Part 446 - Designated Emergency Foster Family Boarding Home Care (§ 446.1 to 446.8)

Part 447 - Agency Boarding Homes (§ 447.1 to 447.11)

Part 448 - Group Homes (§ 448.1 to 448.12)

Part 449 - Supervised Independent Living Programs (§ 449.1 to 449.8)

Part 450 - Limited Secure Facilities for Youth in the Custody of Social Services Districts (§ 450.1 to 450.10)

Part 451 - Group Emergency Foster Care (§ 451.1 to 451.8 to 451.11)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
